remarks: If the ` M ` -th coefficient of ` F ` is nonzero, then the degree of ` F ` is at least ` M ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)
statement:
dgrub.1 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
dgrub.2 $e |- N = ( deg ` F ) $.
dgrub $p |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ M e. NN0 /\ ( A ` M ) =/= 0 ) -> M <_ N ) $.
